name: In re the Nomination Papers of Patrick J. MURPHY as Candidate for Representative in the United States Congress of District Eight, Appeal of Jane Faust
name_abbreviation: In re the Nomination Papers of Murphy

judges: BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, and BALDWIN, JJ.
parties: In re the Nomination Papers of Patrick J. MURPHY as Candidate for Representative in the United States Congress of District Eight, Appeal of Jane Faust.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of April, 2006, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Lawrence M. Otter, Esq., Harrisburg, for Jane Faust.
E. Graham Robb, Jr., Esq., Philadelphia, for Patrick J. Murphy.
Louis Lawrence Boyle, Esq., for Bureau of Commissions, Elections and Legislation.
casebody.head_matter:
895 A.2d 546
In re the Nomination Papers of Patrick J. MURPHY as Candidate for Representative in the United States Congress of District Eight, Appeal of Jane Faust.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 17, 2006.
Decided April 26, 2006.
Lawrence M. Otter, Esq., Harrisburg, for Jane Faust.
E. Graham Robb, Jr., Esq., Philadelphia, for Patrick J. Murphy.
Louis Lawrence Boyle, Esq., for Bureau of Commissions, Elections and Legislation.
BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, and BALDWIN, JJ.
